definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: saffron (crocus sativus) (NH id.; and vb. denom. [[כִּרְכֵּם]]; Hithp. grow yellow, pale; Aram. [[כּוּרְכְּמָא]], kuwrkmo0 Ar. kerkumun = kro/kov, crocus; Lag:Ges. Abh. 58, No. 147; so also JHMordt:sab Denkm. 83 f.; otherwise DHM:ib., who comp. Sab. [[כמכם]], Ar. kamka0mun = Gk. ka/gkamon);—Ct So 4:14; on meaning v. esp. Löw:No. 162.
